titleStmt.title: The foūtayne or well of lyfe, out of whiche doth sprynge mooste swete consolations, ryght necessarye for troubled conscyences to thyntente they shal not despayre in aduersitie and trouble..

publicationStmt.publisher: By William Hill at y[e] Signe of the hyll.,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: stained, torn, and tightly bound, with loss of text; opening of A₅v and A₆r not filmed.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
